title: Bagel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery, Spanish
description: 2015 Reported now all-vegetarian. Bagel bakery in the Balearic Islands, located in a trendy space in old town. Offers bagels, breakfast and lunch food. Uses fresh ingredients from local market. Beverages include French tea, Italian coffee, local & South African wine along with Spanish and German beer. Has Spanish and English newspapers and free Wi-Fi.
